patient_info: Ventricular fibrillation,Pneumonia,Dyspnea,Exercise intolerance,Viral hepatitis,ST segment elevation,Cough
golden_diagnosis: Brugada syndrome 2,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1,Brugada syndrome 6,Brugada syndrome 5,Brugada syndrome 4,Brugada syndrome 8,Brugada syndrome 9,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1,Brugada syndrome 7,Brugada syndrome 3,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1
predict_diagnosis:
1. Viral myocarditis complicated by pneumonia and hepatitis
2. Brugada syndrome with acute viral illness exacerbation
3. Arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia (ARVD) with concurrent respiratory infection
4. Long QT syndrome due to metabolic or genetic factors with superimposed pneumonia
5. Cardiomyopathy due to chronic viral hepatitis
6. Myocarditis associated with dyspnea and exercise intolerance
7. Inflammatory cardiomyopathy (e.g., giant cell myocarditis) with respiratory infection
8. Channelopathy-related arrhythmia (e.g., CAV3 mutation) with pneumonia
9. Drug-induced ventricular fibrillation in the setting of recent medication use for hepatitis or pneumonia
10. Mitochondrial cardiomyopathy presenting with multi-systemic symptoms, including viral hepatitis and respiratory infection.
